channel.title: Authenticate :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Authenticate Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Description: Simple guide hub with a summary paragraph and links to the various guides in the section. Describe authentication options available. Set up user journeys. Currently splitting authentication by functionality. We can either lead the split by functionality or by product.

item.title: Decide on a sign-in solution
item.description: Decide which sign-in solution is right for you Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Okta deployment models - redirect vs. embedded: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/redirect-vs-embedded/ Page type: Navigation Content type: Guide Hub

item.title: Decide on a sign-in protocol
item.description: Decide which authentication protocol is right for you Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: All content except for the use case examples from: Overview of Single Sign-On in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ Note most of the content is good and not specific to the OIN Ensure any OIN-specific content is removed.

item.title: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model
item.description: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Description: In phase 1, if “Setting up okta org policies” can be unified into one place for all (redirect and embedded) guides, we’ll have to add a specific set-up guide for redirect and each of the embedded models.

item.title: Add a direct sign-in experience for high trust scenarios
item.description: Add a sign-in experience directly with the Direct Authentication API Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes This section contains all the Direct Auth integration guides. Each version of the original guide has been pulled into its own guide in the new IA. This was done for several reasons: It improves search results from Google It makes tagging individual guides easier and makes it easier to discover the right version of the guide in both the navbar and via internal search.

item.title: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices
item.description: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Add a intro paragraph specifically stating what scenarios this implementation is used for. When would i use this scenario over direct auth?
